Title: Testimony
Writer: Sean Gray (teleplay by), Will Smith (teleplay by), Armando Iannucci (story by), Sean Gray (story by), Will Smith (story by), Armando Iannucci (created by)

Plot: Members of Selina's staff testify before a congressional committee.
